name: Practical Lock Picking: A Physical Penetration Tester's Training Guide
description: Detailed instructions and exercises designed for professional physical security specialists, consultants, and red teams.

name: Chaos Communications Congress (CCC)
description: CCC hosts the German Lockpicking Championships.

name: DEF CON
description: Annual infosec industry conference which is popular with many lockpickers featuring a locksport contest.

name: Hackers On Planet Earth (HOPE)
description: Annual conference often featuring a locksport competition and presentations on physical security.

name: OzLockCon
description: Open community event focusing on physical security in Australia, which hosts a lockpicking and handcuff evasion competition.

name: LockCon
description: Annual, invitation-only international conference about locks for members of respected locksport organizations.

name: 3D Printed Lock Picks
description: Print lock picks made of plastic materials that, while weak, will survive at least several uses. (Find more digital models.)

name: DIY Lock Pick Set from a Windshield Wiper
description: Illustrated guide to building a custom lock pick and tension wrench from windshield wipers.

name: How to Make a Set of Lockpicks! (using street sweeper bristles)
description: Instructions for using discarded street sweeper bristles as material for dual-sided turning tools and picks.

name: Making Tension Wrenches/Turning Tools From Old Windshield Wiper Blades
description: Instructions for turning old windshield wipers into any of a variety of lock pick types and turning tool styles.

name: Under Door Tool Kit Instructions
description: Short guide to constructing an under-door ("lever opening"/"Mule") tool using material available at a typical hardware store.

name: Art of Lockpicking
description: Educational website with animations detailing the process of picking locks.

name: Beginner's Guide to Security Pins
description: Short article guiding beginners comfortable with picking padlocks towards an understanding of more complex locks.

name: BosnianBill's Lock Picking for Beginners
description: YouTube playlist of selected instructional videos sorted in order from first principles to techniques for specific locks.

name: CIA Lock Picking Field Operative Training Manual
description: Guidebook covering terminology, tool use, and techniques for picking the vast majority of pin and wafer tumbler locks.

name: Deviant Ollam's Lockpicking Video Presentations and Advisories
description: Collection of physec talks and locksport advice for all skill levels from a world-reknowned expert.

name: Easy Pickings
description: Mini Lockpicking Manual - Widely-distributed beginner's manual with diagrams showcasing how to pick various entry-level locks.

name: MIT Lock Picking Guide
description: Famous introductory text by Ted the Tool.

name: Lock Picking: Detail Overkill
description: Exceptionally thorough guide "for those who want more than just the basics."

name: LockLab's Lock Picking Course
description: Complete start-to-finish course from basic tensioning to speciality lock techniques.

name: Locksport International Guide to Lock Picking
description: Locksport primer in the style of a comic book, with photographs and speech bubbles.

name: Fraternal Order of Lock Sport (FOOLS)
description: Lock picking club established to serve Bloomington, Indiana and surrounding areas.

name: The Open Organization Of Lockpickers (TOOOL)
description: Worldwide association of lockpickers with national, regional, and local chapters.

name: Locksport International
description: International association of lockpickers who offer help starting new locksport clubs and groups.

name: Keypicking.com
description: Bustling online forum for the discussion of lockpicking and locksport.

name: Lockpicking101.com
description: One of the longest-running online communities "dedicated to the fun and ethical hobby of lock picking."

name: LockWiki
description: Community-driven reference for both beginners and professionals in the security industry.

name: /r/lockpicking Subreddit
description: Subreddit dedicated to the sport of lockpicking.

name: Dark Sim 905's Lockpicking pages
description: Personal website of a knowledgable hobbyist discussing a variety of picking and bypass tools.

name: Lockpicking Forensics
description: Website "dedicated to the science and study of forensic locksmithing."

name: The Amazing King's Lockpicking pages
description: Hobbyist's website with detailed pages about locks, tools, and picking techniques.

name: Learn Lockpicking
description: Retailer of speciality practice locks, lock stands, and more.

name: Lock Pick Canada
description: Canadian retailer carrying a wide range of manufacturers, including Souber dimple lock picks, a manufacturer that only sells to other businesses.

name: Lockpick Extreme
description: Retailer notable for their lockpicking accessories featuring earrings and other jewelry that also function as sturdy tools.

name: Mad Bob Picks
description: UK-based manufacturer of lock pick accessories, notable for their Jackknifes and lifetime warranty.

name: Peterson Locksmith Tools / Peterson Manufacturing, Inc.
description: Manufacturer of precision lock picking tools and accessories; their top-of-keyway turning tools are famous but overpriced (you can make your own).

name: Safe Ventures, Inc.
description: Retailer for safe-opening tools who also offer paid training courses.

name: Security Snobs
description: Retailer of numerous high-security, collector, and cutaway locks who also maintain some informational pages about locksmithing.

name: Southern Ordinance / Exit 10, Inc.
description: SouthOrdÂ® is a manufacturer of lock picks and professional locksmith tools; individual replacement picks as low as $1.50 USD.

name: Southern Specialities
description: Retailer of numerous lockpicking sets, pick guns, and more.

name: Sparrows Lock Picks
description: Manufacturer of specialty and quality lock pick tools; their King Pin pinning tweezer is particularly useful.
